General.Name: Banco de Credito e Inversiones
General.Description: Banco de Crédito e Inversiones provides various banking products and services in Chile, United States, and Peru. The company operates through Retail Banking; SME Banking; Wholesale Banking; Finance; BCI Financial Group; Financial Services; and Others segments. It offers checking and other accounts; cards; mortgage and consumer credit, business credit, short term and long term commercial credit, guarantee slip, overdraft line, and corporate financing; and life and health, emergency room, car, home, antitheft, pet, international travel, and credit protection insurance products. The company also provides factoring, leasing, current account, margin lending, and cash management services; financing, corporate finance, international trade, solutions, transactional, investments services, advisory, and payment orders, as well as currencies, hedging, and structure of derivatives. Banco de Crédito e Inversiones was incorporated in 1937 and is headquartered in Santiago, Chile. Banco de Crédito e Inversiones is a subsidiary of Empresas Juan Yarur S.P.A.
General.Address: 125 El Golf Avenue, Santiago de Chile, Chile
